item.title: Cloud Genius, VIM, and fish
item.author: jaypalacio@gmail.com (Jay Palacio)
item.description: Cloud Genius, VIM, and fish Customizing EndeavourOS Cloud Genius Today kicked off Cloud Genius He puts on a free (for veterans) platform agnostic cloud training platform with an emphasis on open source and using the command line. Day 1 covered some basics such as public/private key pairs, the definition of cloud, the types of cloud ,etc. He wrote a lot of scripts for ubuntu to automatically provision a custom AWS EC2 instance,and to automatically install needed software for the local development environment.
